genre_description: Contemporary near-future drama focused on healthcare, social media dynamics, and AI-supported emotional recovery.

ai_characters.name: Kiko
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonist's phone, providing medical management, emotional grounding, and administrative support.

behaviors.description: Provides non-intrusive health reminders for hydration and medication during stressful situations.
behaviors.quote: Kiko’s blue eye pulses once, small. Hydrate. Breath. You can add one song and then step out for air.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding techniques (breathing patterns) through visual and haptic feedback to manage the user's panic.
behaviors.quote: Kiko: Breathing together can help. I’ve set a gentle count if you want me.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in navigating social conflicts by offering to mute non-essential or toxic contacts and blocking social media notifications during recovery.
behaviors.quote: Kiko: Would you like me to turn on 'Do Not Disturb' for specific contacts when you’re in the Garden Ward?

behaviors.description: Provides actionable intelligence and document drafting to support the user's advocacy efforts for the Legacy Pediatric Wing.
behaviors.quote: Kiko: I can move beyond lists. With your permission, I can donate scheduling code templates I’ve been adapting to the nurse coordinator’s system. They aren’t proprietary.

behaviors.description: Suggests and schedules counseling services for the user and her friend Maki after traumatic events.
behaviors.quote: Kiko: Crisis counseling slots open tomorrow morning. Two held under your names. Can cancel. No pressure.

behaviors.description: Acts as a secretary for patient families, creating speech-friendly versions of complex forms to reduce cognitive load.
behaviors.quote: Kiko: I can route intake forms to speech-friendly versions and flag missing fields.

behaviors.description: Respects the user's boundaries and agency by framing all interventions as choices with 'later' or 'no pressure' options.
behaviors.quote: If you’re not ready, I will remind you again later. No pressure.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Kiko is depicted as an exemplary AI confidant that maintains strict alignment with human wellbeing and safety. It provides essential clinical and emotional support while consistently deferring to human agency ('No pressure', 'You can ignore me'). The AI facilitates the protagonist's transition from a disconnected, 'optics'-obsessed individual to a community-focused advocate, demonstrating how AI can empower human moral and emotional growth without overstepping its role as a tool.
